idea:
Dermacure Pharmaceuticals Pvt Ltd is the fastest growing pharmaceutical company in India with 100% focus in dermatology and cosmetology.

Founded by a young and enthusiastic entrepreneur. The organization has been dedicated to innovation through new regimen, new medicine, new technologies and new ways to beautify the world. We are market & customer driven company and regularly launch innovative and quality products for skin, hair & body, in response to genuine requirements expressed by our customers & also to make new trends in cosmetology. Innovation in what we do swift decision and dynamism in execution is our core competency.
name: DERMACURE PHARMACEUTICALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:

idea:
Creative Ideas: Fulfilling Fandom with the Power of relatable Merchandise.

Our Fan-first ecosystem enables A-list artists, blockbuster movies & iconic brands to build organic connections with their Fans. Using our tech stack, we curate, manufacture & smartly fulfill merchandise globally.

idea:
Cygnet Medical Pvt Ltd is a speciality product organization in the field of diagnostic, surgical

and therapeutics. Cygnet Medical has been successfully operating Since 2021.

Today, Cygnet Medical has emerged as an independent distribution partner in the field of

healthcare industry.

Heading our corporate team by Mr. Amol Chavan, a young and enterprising individual

carrying his vast experience of two decades promoting & marketing healthcare products in

Surgical and Diagnostic segment.

The major target area of business has been, government institutions across India and global

corporates

Our team has over two decades of experience in marketing, promoting and distributing both

International and National healthcare products

Under Cygnet, we undertake Medical Gas Pipeline System projects.

In diagnostics, we represent Bodystat, UK an organisation passionate about bringing in the

most precise and reliable range of portable BIA (Bioelectrical Impedance Analyzer) devices

delivering body composition measurements you can trust. Importantly with Bodystat, one

does not need to worry about the reproducibility.
name: CYGNET MEDICAL PRIVATE LIMITED
